overview.en: Polkamarkets (POLK) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Polkamarkets has a current supply of 100,000,000 with 13,450,000 in circulation. The last known price of Polkamarkets is 2.66720921 USD and is down -12.86 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 6 active market(s) with $1,682,299.21 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://www.polkamarkets.com/.
